subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Because of the reported steroid use of his past and because baseball still does not test for all performance-enhancing drugs, Jason Giambi may never be able to convince people that he is clean.
snippet: Because of the reported steroid use of his past and because baseball still does not test for all performance-enhancing drugs, Jason Giambi may never be able to convince people that he is clean.
